__e: You asked me once about why I went in the shop, but I never told you.

Why... w-why didn't you just ask him about the watch then?
Well, why didn't you just damn well ask for goodness' sakes?
And that's why I said no when you asked about the venue.

-And, uh, we looked all through your room And you asked me if I had it, And I said I definitely did not have your passport?
